repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: AAA Audio Recording #6145 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5004: AAA Arbitration in Government 5119: AAA Voluntary Labor Arbitration Tribunal Case Files 6309: AAA Arbitration in the Schools Records
